content: उपभुज् {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To enjoy, taste (in all senses); तपसामुपभुंजानाः फलानि <ls>Ku. 6. 10</ls>; नोपभुज्यते is not enjoyed, <ls>Pt. 2. 142</ls>; <ls>Ms. 12. 8.</ls> {@--2@} To eat, drink; पयः <ls>R. 2. 65</ls>, <ls n="R.">1. 67</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 40</ls>; अर्धोपभुक्तेन <ls>Ku. 3. 37</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 325.</ls> {@--3@} To possess; स्त्रीरत्नमुपभुंक्ष्व <ls>Hariv.</ls> {@--4@} To use, make use of, receive.
